prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has a sleek body and vibrant colors.
Show me a legendary Pokemon with unique abilities and an eye-catching design.
Imagine a mythical creature that embodies the spirit of both water and fighting types.
Design a Pokemon that features flowing mane-like elements and a powerful presence.

distinctive_features: Distinctive blue and yellow color pattern
